overview: Fang Dong (Yang Run Kun) has everything going for him. He is happily engaged to Yu Ting (Yao Yuan), and his life is going well. But one day, he gets a prank call from Xia Xiao Duo (Zhang Hong Lei), and it unexpectedly changes everything. He drastically changes his views on life and love at the expense of his fiancée.
title: Platon's Love
